title: 有冇人睇過晒宮騎駿每一套動畫

replies.msg: 有冇咩得著感受

If you are saying every "movie" he produced, yes.
If you are saying every "animation" he produced, no.
(some of them are displayed only in specfic museum/exhibition)

The power of gibili's production, personally, comes from the basis of fusing big issue into an all-age plot.

Instead of learning anything particular,more likely to say, there are always sth more inside those character. Some of them may recall the younger you, some of the scenes gives you a different emotion when grown up.

Especially for the last couple movie, when miyazaki may be protraiting himself, showing the cruelness of time, the emotion in commemorating someone, you can say some of those elements are still extremely rare to be spot in modern animations, and perhaps not welcomed in 22century, when audience are spoon fed with tits, big eyes and kawaii costumes.
